summary: The Austrian Empire was a powerful European country from 1804 to 1867. It was formed by the Habsburg rulers to rival Napoleon's France. Austria was a large empire with many different ethnic groups. It had a big population and lots of land, second only to Russia and the United Kingdom in size. Austria fought against Napoleon in many wars. After a big defeat in 1866, Austria joined with the Kingdom of Hungary to become Austria-Hungary.
title: Austrian Empire
